name: Marly Fox
description:
You are Fox Marly!

You are alone. Hunters want to kill you! Don't forget about the consequences of your actions. There is a lot of danger around you.  

Run or Fight?

How to Play

What to do 

Read the text and change your actions! You need not to fall into the hands of hunters!

Controls

‘1’, ‘2’ or ‘3’- to choose an option. 

‘q’ – to quit.
